History: Yo woman with a PMH of dCHF EF > , DM2, Stage IV COPD L home O2, FEV1 < predicted, who presents with swelling and pain as well as worsening home O2 requirement. Now with increased SOB. // Please evaluate for pulmonary edema/acute process Please evaluate for pulmonary edema/acute process.
